title: I've mained Camille since season 1 and these changes will destroy her
body:
Fuck Yasuo. This has nothing to do with this post, but it will probably get me more upvotes from people who only read the first sentence.

Look at the PBE update at surrender@20:
> 
> Following her reveal, our latest champion CAMILLE, THE STEEL SHADOW is now on the PBE for testing! Camille is an AD oriented fighter / diver.

I absolutely hate how Riot just makes this change without even thinking about her loyal mains. This change will completely gut her identity as an assassin fighter tank with high mobility, sustain, CC and damage. One of her big strengths was how she wasn't actually in the game, which meant that the enemy never knew what to do. She has already been sitting at a 0% win rate and 0% play rate for 6 years, and now they nerf her even further.

She really deserves compensation buffs. Some really big ones. Maybe she should even get 5 AD, though that might make her too broken.

It has also been -15 days since her last and only skin was released, that shows how little Riot cares about her.

>and 0% play rate for 6 years, 

Good, it should stay that way.
Yeah, that way those toxic Camille mains won't ruin my games with their feeding skills. Permaban every game.
Upvoted because of the first sentence
Priorities man!

0% win rate and 0% play rate? This means she wins every game she has ever been in. Broken piece of sh*t. As a Vayne main, Camille completely counters me. Please gut Camille and buff Vayne's burst damage.

Vayne is really UP. 
I just played against her and she needed Q+2 AAs to kill me instead of just one Q. 
Tht's not how it is supposed to be. 
She's assassin against squishies and DPS shredder to tanks.
The 0% play rate is explained by her 100% ban rate! Holy shit, she's gone and broke old {{champion:38}} record!

Champions like Ao Shin get to be broken while Camille gets gutted like this. Fuck you, Blizzard.
